MARXdown is an online digital project developed for the Contemporary Marxist Reading Group (CMRG) at Carnegie Mellon University using the lightweight markup language Markdown.

Home About How It Works Search Annotate me GitHub project

Currently v1.0 Distributed with an MIT license.
